Mr Enda Kenny accused the Taoiseach of a`` cowardly, disgraceful act'' and that he was refusing to come in here today to tell the people of his country what is happening with a Government that has imploded, with a Government that is dysfunctional, that has disintegrated, and that had let our people down . Labour leader Eamon Gilmore claimed the affair was unprecedented and eccentric.`` What is happening here this morning is disrespectful of the people of this country,'' Mr Eamon Gilmore said.``
